text: @realDonaldTrump Our country is closing down again! Just in time for Independence Day after months of crap! Thanks to your poor management of COVID-19 - You are not a leader! You’ve ruined our country! We are banned to travel to the EU! We are sick of this and sick of you. Anyone but Trump!!!

domain.name: Person
